mapper.insert: insert into healthy_record (baby_seq, user_id, test_code, is_checked, created_at) values (#{baby_seq}, #{user_id}, #{test_code}, #{is_checked}, #{created_at})
mapper.delete: delete from healthy_record where baby_seq = #{baby_seq} and user_id = #{user_id} and test_code = #{test_code}
mapper.select: select test_code, is_checked, created_at from healthy_record where baby_seq = #{baby_seq} and user_id = #{user_id}
